about_the_game:
SVFI Creative Extension Pack Access A

Ignite your infinite creativity with SVFI
This DLC enables users to use Preset Panel and Plugins for Adobe® After Effects.

THIS DLC IS ALREADY INCLUDED IN PROFESSIONAL VERSION

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® MX250 / NVIDIA Graphics Cards with Maxwell Architecture® (GTX 750Ti+)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
